  • Method Details

    • addBaseProduct

      boolean addBaseProduct​(java.lang.String name, double price)
      Parameters:
      name - is the base product name
      price - of the base product
      Returns:
      true if the base product hasn't already exists
      Precondition:
      (name != null) && (price > 0.0)

    • addCompositeProduct

      boolean addCompositeProduct​(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<java.lang.String> baseProducts)
      Parameters:
      name - is the composite product name
      baseProducts - is a list of base products which are included in the composite product
      Returns:
      true if composite product hasn't already exists and if all of the base products are in the menu
      Precondition:
      (name!=null) && (baseProducts.size() > 0)

    • deleteBaseProduct

      boolean deleteBaseProduct​(java.lang.String productName)
      Parameters:
      productName - is the name of the deleted base product
      Returns:
      true if the base product is in the menu list
      Precondition:
      productName!=null

    • deleteCompositeProduct

      boolean deleteCompositeProduct​(java.lang.String productName)
      Parameters:
      productName - is the name of the deleted composite product
      Returns:
      true if the composite product was found in the menu
      Precondition:
      productName!=null

    • createOrder

      boolean createOrder​(java.lang.String tableName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> orderedProducts)
      Parameters:
      tableName - is the name of the table where an order was taken
      orderedProducts - is a list of the ordered products
      Returns:
      true if no order was taken at that table before and if the ordered products exist
      Precondition:
      (tableName!=null) && (orderedProducts.size() > 0)

    • computeOrderPrice

      double computeOrderPrice​(java.lang.String tableName)
      Parameters:
      tableName - is the name of the table whose order price is calculate
      Returns:
      the total order of the order
      Precondition:
      tableName!=null
      Postcondition:
      the return value should be > 0

    • generateBill

      boolean generateBill​(java.lang.String tableName)
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table where a bill is generated
      Returns:
      true if the table take an order before
      Precondition:
      tableName!=null

    • changePrice

      boolean changePrice​(java.lang.String name, double price)
      Parameters:
      name - represents the product name whose price is trying to be changed
      price - the new price of the product
      Returns:
      true if the product exists
      Precondition:
      (name!=null) && (price > 0)

    • addBPToCP

      boolean addBPToCP​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String toAdd)
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the composite product where a base product is added
      toAdd - is the name of the base product
      Returns:
      true if both base product and composite product exists in the menu list
      Precondition:
      (name!=null) && (toAdd!=null)
      Postcondition:
      the composite product price, must have changed

    • deleteBPFromCP

      boolean deleteBPFromCP​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String toDelete)
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the composite product from where is trying to delete a base product
      toDelete - is the name of the base product which must be deleted
      Returns:
      true if both base product and composite product exist in menu
      Precondition:
      (name!=null) && (toDelete!=null)
